sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ProductContentSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Downloads content from respective CDN and loads into the relevant tables for the following products:
- What's New
- Adoption Services</description>
        <name>ProductContentSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ProductContentSNC = Class.create();
ProductContentSNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	canSyncWithCDN: function() {
		return SNC.ProductContentDownloader.canSyncWithProductCDN();
	},

	refreshContent: function(contentPath, fileName) {
		try {
			return SNC.ProductContentDownloader.refreshXMLContent(contentPath, fileName);
		} catch (err) {
			gs.info("Error in updating Product Content: " + err);
			return false;
		}
	},

    type: 'ProductContentSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-29 08:29:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b1cb850a0b213110985f8a8db777b256</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ProductContentSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Help and Guidance Backend" source="com.glide.sn_help">cab9f0283cf1311068bcf327dfe37f11</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b1cb850a0b213110985f8a8db777b256</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-29 12:49:44</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
